stanza.line: Against that time (if ever that time (a)come)(/a)
When I shall see thee frown on my (b)defects(/b)
When as thy love hath cast his utmost (a)sum(/a)
Called to that audit by advised (b)respects(/b)
Against that time when thou shalt strangely (c)pass(/c)
And scarcely greet me with that sun thine (d)eye(/d)
When love converted from the thing it (c)was(/c)
Against that time do I ensconce me (e)here(/e)
Within the knowledge of mine own (f)desert(/f)
And this my hand against my self (e)uprear(/e)
To guard the lawful reasons on thy (f)part(/f)
To leave poor me thou hast the strength of (g)laws(/g)
Since why to love I can allege no (g)cause(/g)
